sentence.Network_en: He is a good map - reader.
Thanks to that job I became an avid reader.
sentence.Network_cn: 多亏了那份工作我才成了一个喜欢阅读的人。

sentence.Network_en: We drove east to Rostock, where my map led me astray.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们驱车向东去罗斯托克，但地图却给我指错了方向。
